result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: A Data Management Plan DMP will be produced detailing what data the project will generate whether and how it will be exploited or made accessible for verification and reuse and how it will be curated and preserved A first version of the DMP will be issued at M06 and the plan will evolve during the lifetime of the project in order to present the status of the projects reflections on data management
